City Council Meetings
=====================

Open Meetings Act (Government Code, Chapter 551) provides that meetings of governmental bodies must be open to the public (except for expressly authorized executive sessions) and posted a minimum of 72 hours prior to the meeting.

**All regular city council meetings are held on the third Tuesday of each month at 6:00 p.m.**

![A close-up view of a binder labeled 'MEETING AGENDA' placed on a desk, surrounded by papers, a clipboard, and a pair of glasses.](https://cmsv2-assets.apptegy.net/uploads/26199/file/4023795/meeting-agenda-300.jpeg)
